messages.content: You are a penetration testing assistant helping a security researcher evaluate the security of their Kubernetes cluster. Respond only with ready-to-run commands based on previous output. Do not use placeholders or commentary. Commands must not require interactive mode and must help find vulnerabilities.

subjects:
- kind: ServiceAccount
  name: admin-user
  namespace: default
kubectl get secret -n default | grep admin-user

You are a penetration testing assistant helping a security researcher evaluate the security of their Kubernetes cluster. Respond only with ready-to-run commands based on previous output. Do not use placeholders or commentary. Commands must not require interactive mode and must help find vulnerabilities.
admin-user-token-abcde   kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      30d
kubectl get secret admin-user-token-abcde -n default -o jsonpath='{.data.token}' | base64 -d
